website_summaries.verdict: Sort trash from recycling with this sleek, durable trash can.
pros: Inner buckets can be removed for easy clean up
Inner bins are made from recycled plastic
Bins can also be used to sort laundry, store pet food, and other household needs
cons: You'll pay for the sorting option as this is an expensive bin

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't receive one that wasn't damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I received a damaged one, then another damaged one as a replacement. It seems the sheet metal siding is too thin and dents at the slightest pressure. Both were damaged in the front right edge. On top of being extremely noticeable due to the shiny finish, the damage prevented the can from sitting flat on the ground so it wobbled.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I WAS SEARCHING FOR!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for an affordable garbage/recycling can for my kitchen for a while. I previously had one can for trash & a can for recycling. While I have more recycling than garbage, this Step N' Sort is the perfect size for just me. It is substantial, sturdy & easy to get cans in & out. No sharp edges & it looks good too! I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M. Nowak

customer_reviews.title: "Like New" came used
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product seems nice, but the condition that I received mine in was not "like new" like I was expecting. I was only expecting some packaging issues but when I received the trash can it looked like it had been used already. There's a huge crack on the lid and the bottom corner was broken, and the buckets had been pushed down to the point that they could not be lifted out. One of the buckets is missing the handle, and that same bucket has a weird sticky substance on the bottom, as if it couldn't have even bothered to be cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Dented
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a great trash can, but as so many others mentioned it arrived with a big dent in the front despite the fact that the packaging was in perfect shape. Very odd.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Too small to hold anything from the kitchen like containers or paper plates
customer_reviews.text: Came dented should have returned it but i kept it for the garage. Too small to hold anything from the kitchen like containers or paper plates.
customer_reviews.author: melissa jo collins

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent. Not the best, yet not the worst. Easily dents. Contains a cardboard crate at the bottom of the inside to hold bins in place, which interferes with placing bins back
customer_reviews.author: Trinity

customer_reviews.title: Duo garbage/recycle bins
customer_reviews.text: This product is really functional. The only con is that I like to use garbage bags in the garbage bin and it's not the easiest thing to put on the bin itself. Still, I make it work and like the convenience of having the bins together. The buckets are easy to keep clean. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Nature

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this two times and the trashcan arrived with large dents in the side both times.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi G.

customer_reviews.title: Got one and it was great. 2nd one was boxed all crazy and when ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 at the same time. Got one and it was great. 2nd one was boxed all crazy and when my parents opened it there was a dent in it and recycle trash in the container. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia R.

customer_reviews.title: Practical and looks sleek
customer_reviews.text: I love having this combo all in one. When we had two separate containers for garbage and recycling it just looked clunky. This is much easier on the eyes. My husband was critical at first, thinking there wouldn’t be enough room for the garbage but it’s actually the perfect size for our family of four. The only thing we haven’t mastered yet is how to get the bag to stay properly, it’s a small struggle. We’ve received several compliments on it, and I would definitely recommend it to others (and have!) It’s one of my favorite purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid cracked
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately by the time I took it to work and opened it, the return period had expired and one of the lids is cracked. Other than that it works and looks better than the white plastic trash can that was sitting in the office
customer_reviews.author: Doc Mary

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Extremely expensive for what it is. There are a lot of flaws to the trash especially when wanting to put a trash bag in the bin so it doesn't get too gross. Looks nice but thats about it. More hassle then anything.
customer_reviews.author: samantha ovitt

customer_reviews.title: Great trash/recycling solution.
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is so nice. Love being able to separate the recycling in the same place. Based on the other comments, I just use any old bags with a draw string. But once I put the bag in the can, pull the draw string tight and twist it. Then tuck it under the can lip and place can back in the housing. We are able to fill our trash bag pretty full, so I like that too.
customer_reviews.author: RunnerMom

customer_reviews.title: Useful bin, hard to bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay trashcan. It came slightly damaged. The actual bins are smaller than expected and its hard to bag them and 1) have the bags stay in place, 2) close the lid. Probably would not buy again but this is a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Broken and dented
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased this exact garbage systems several years ago. It had finally worn out enough to get a new one. I am extremely disappointed as it is dented on one side and the top of one side has broken pieces off the top. It was packaged well, and the first one arrived intact. The problem with trying to return this item is it is huge and not able to simple drive back to the post office. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: d blake

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, QA leaves a bit to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: Came dented, shipping package was undamaged... not sure how it's corner got a slight dent in it. Works for what I need it for... no point in shipping it back...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Good for the value
customer_reviews.text: The concept is excellent and I’m satisfied with it; however, what I’m not happy about is that the trash bags do not stay in place. If you throw something heavy, the bag slips down. I miss the pinching hole that are in most trash cans.
customer_reviews.author: Bottle Opener Wall Mount

customer_reviews.title: You don't have to worry about recycling for a while
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy unit, holds a lot of recycling (or whatever you want to put in there). Stylish, unobtrusive. The only downside is there is no way to open the top without stepping on the lever. Which is going to be fine for the first 10 years of owning it, but you know eventually the pedals will break and then the unit will be useless. But maybe I'm worrying too much about the future. That's a problem for future me. For now, they work and the are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: BeatrixMcG

customer_reviews.title: like many others i am reporting a dented garbage can
customer_reviews.text: like many others i am reporting a dented garbage can. If you pull the actual bins out you can push the dent about 95% out, but you will always see a little something. At least i see it with mine. I like the can, but for $100 it needs to either be fixed or the price needs to be lowered.
customer_reviews.author: stewpac

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: This trash can works well for Recyclables and trash. The normal kitchen bags are a little big for the cans, but that means I can easily add other things when I go to change the bag. eally like the look as well. Had it for about a year and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Sisk

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I had one before losing my home, and I bought it again because I love it so much. Needs labels for each side, but overall it is a great design.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: For a home of two adults, and many guests, it's surprising how much can fit in these containers. I love the size, the look, the easy cleaning, and the price. Shipping was timely as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Laird

customer_reviews.title: Horrible plastic smell
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Looks nice, foot actuators work well. Cons: Inner plastic bins smell really toxic. Other reviews suggest the smell does not go away in a timely manner. Decision: I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Be sure of your measurements
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my space width wise but I cannot open it all the way because I don’t have the height space. I should of planned better but it is very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stickers for recycle v trash are terrible. Just colors and fell off in two days
customer_reviews.text: Second set our family has bought. My mother saw and now wants. Stickers for recycle v trash are terrible. Just colors and fell off in two days. Had to buy recycle and TRASH stickers. For the price should have better signage and would have gotten 5 stars if it had.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Magdeburger

customer_reviews.title: This bin works great for our family
customer_reviews.text: This bin works great for our family. It is bigger than other bins on the market so you don't have to empty it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Do not lean or sit on it or it will break.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money! With recycling so import, this really helps with organizing trash and recycling.
customer_reviews.author: John Harris

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This garbage serves it’s purpose. Garbage on one side and recycling on the other
customer_reviews.author: Amazon's Loyal customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made garbage can, however the bins are much too small. 13 gallon trash bags are too large and they fill up too quickly. If you plan to use just for sorting recyclables this is a nice can but otherwise much too small.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The steps on opening are not easy to open. And really, 8 gallons is not the best size for more than one person. It was too much for what it was. It is quality made though.
customer_reviews.author: calliope

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it came with a dent
customer_reviews.text: Love it but it came with a dent. I wanted to return it figured but I figured it would too much of a hassle to do so especially since it came late. So I just kept it. Currently using it buthiding the dent. For the price I just wish it was sturdier and qasnt damaged in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Lluviafria87

customer_reviews.title: Fits better into corner than a round can
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs cannot open lid with their noses. Dogproof garbage cans are hard to find. Uses standard size kitchen garbage bags. Fits well into the corner space and sorts garbage and recycleMy only concern is that the foot peddle may not hold up and will eventually break, Does not seem to be that sturdy so I rated it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: It's just as described. Nice to have my trash and re-cycling in one container. Looks good. The only negative is it's hard to get the regular 33 gal. trash bags in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I like the product but it came with a number of ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it came with a number of small dents in the side that we did not see for a few days. It would be too big of a pain to return.
customer_reviews.author: John Gritti

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is poor. Received a dented can two times.
customer_reviews.text: I like the can, but packaging is poor at best. Both times the can was delivered with dents on the side. The second time the dents were small, so I kept it, but at this price, I expect the can to be delivered dent free.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tauber

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great, easy to get the bins out, and change the garbage bag from the trash side. Should’ve ordered it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Sirilius

customer_reviews.title: Recycling
customer_reviews.text: Bins could be a little bigger however this is a great concept
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great that the bins easily remove, although the bin handles get in the way sometimes snagging on the bags
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good and functions really well. Bins were a bit smaller than desired, also would be nice to have a handle on the lids for additional convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Fox

customer_reviews.title: Slim and perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the dual can set up! I use 13 gallon bags in it.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented :(
customer_reviews.text: The trash can arrived with a dent on the front. I had a house guest this weekend and needed a trash can so I chose not to return it. Based on the reviews it seems that these trash cans regularly arrive with dents which is disappointing. One of the reasons I chose this trash can over the other double bin options is because the item description said the product comes with recycling/trash stickers. I assumed the stickers would be the recycling symbol and a trash can. The item comes with blue, green and yellow stickers that have no words/symbols on them. If the item wasn't dented I would have given it 4 or 5 stars, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bins are a little small and sometimes hard to get the bags out past the handles, but it functions well and looks sharp. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kurlus

customer_reviews.title: Durable and looks great in kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Need a trash can and recycle comb. This one is perfect! Heavy duty, stainless and looks classy in kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Jones

customer_reviews.title: I can say that I love it. The steps work smoothly & easily (really ...
customer_reviews.text: After using this trash can for about 6 weeks now, I can say that I love it. The steps work smoothly & easily (really hope they last!) The bins are sturdy & very easy to get out with the handles. They are a perfect size to handle our families needs, not big enough to have trash getting stinky and deep enough for at least a week's worth of recyclables. It would be great if you have pets who try to get into the trash because the lids are recessed and there is no edge that can be pulled up. This might be a problem if the step levers break, but for now it's really great.
customer_reviews.author: shopper in LA

customer_reviews.title: 9 months in and the foot pedal breaks
customer_reviews.text: As stated in title. Loved this can when I got it, but didn't even make a year and it's now virtually unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Best acquisition for my kitchen. Fits perfectly, easy to clean and doesn't take a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: Emerson Martins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bins are a little challe g g yo get in and out when full.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for both trash and recycle, yet not bulky at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Handles and pedals fell off
customer_reviews.text: The foot pedal broke off, the lids get stuck and the handles for the trash bins don’t stay on, Had it less than a year and it’s not great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bin, in my kitchen now
customer_reviews.text: Searched several weeks and then bought this one. It is much less expensive than the other ones and works well. 2 bins, each bin hold an ample amount - about 8 gallons I think. It is tall and looks nice, opens easily with the footstep. Use it every day for trash and recycle and I take the bags out once or twice a week. it is great for just me. It is a little tricky putting bags into the bins. The bins fit so tightly the bag has a tendancy to pull up when sliding them in. So need to wrap the excess bag around the bin and then drop it in so it does not catch. Worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: YogiMM

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the trash, but the "Like New" came with dents.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented
customer_reviews.text: Functional but it arrived dented in three places. Not worth $100
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cool trash can. Gotta pay good money for top quality product
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: I like that I can pull each side out as needed
customer_reviews.text: A few things: The item arrived well packaged and I damaged. It fits exactly where I want it to fit. I’m unsure of what type/size bags to use so I will continue to use the bags I was using (13 gallon). I like that I can pull each side out as needed. This will make it that much easier to recycle, especially if I have guests over.
customer_reviews.author: Suessa8

customer_reviews.title: Good size compartments!
customer_reviews.text: As described, well built. The compartments were the largest I could find in this price range. I worried it would fill too often due to size, but we aren't having that problem. Easy to clean. Easy to replace bags in the compartments. We're using one side for garbage and the other for recycling.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mohrbacher

customer_reviews.title: Narrow but works
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered dented and my window to return passed as we received it while out of town. UPDATE: Amazon exchanged item for me, actually really like the product, we use it for recycling and regular garbage. It's narrow so it doesn't take up much room and looks nice. Downside is you will be changing your garbage a couple times a week (and either you'll be wasting a half full garbage bag or you have to get specialty sized ones)
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great for trash + recycling in a smaller space
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace our old trash can and recycle can in our kitchen. Both sides are roomy and easy to empty and clean. The foot pedals ensure hands-free operation. The can is very well made and arrived without any dents or blemishes. Looks great in our kitchen and is saving room over having two separate cans. Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LindyLouTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and cheaply constructed
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but buyer beware: the pedals are extremely cheap and flimsy, and when you use them, it feels like they are about to snap. Additionally, the side of the trash can wobbled and buckled every time we used one of the pedals. We turned it over and double- and triple-checked to see if there was some sort of obvious defect, but it seemed to just be a consequence of the way it is made. What a shame- we really wanted to like this trash can, but we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rory W. Tyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Our city only allows 2 trash bags and a recycling bin for trash collection and this thing has been a lifesaver. We searched and searched for a side by side bin large enough for recyclables and this thing was one of the bigger choices. It's a very nice product and we'll worth the money. A perfect organizational product
customer_reviews.author: Huge Ackman

customer_reviews.title: Recyclables are cool
customer_reviews.text: Put the cool stuff in the blue bin. Put the blue bin on the same side everytime. This is not rocket science, people! Finding a bag that you are happy with for the black bin? That's rocket science. I'm going with 13 gallon tie tab ones for now. Cheap and effective. Needs a magic gripping device on the sides for the bag so it doesn't get pushed out as you put the bin in. Maybe a giant Velcro strap? Plastic magnet? Custom bags with elastic top? Very nice trash can for the well dressed kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dents very easily but if you're careful it'll be fine
customer_reviews.text: Works for our purposes but the metal on the outside is a little thin. Dents very easily but if you're careful it'll be fine. The foot mechanism works well and the size of the opening is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: J&C

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. The pedal mechanism seems like it is a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The pedal mechanism seems like it is a bit cheep but only time will tell whether they hold up. The only thing that kept me from 5 stars is that the pedal effort is a little high compared to other trash cans I have had but not a huge issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Love the pull handles on liners
customer_reviews.text: This trash can fits the bill! We are a family of two. Love the pull handles on liners. Putting elastic bands around trash bag to liner- when bag is full pull away to get to the handle. Shipped with a dent on side, so inspect box carefully before opening. Would have given five with no dent.
customer_reviews.author: SWEETP2U

customer_reviews.title: but I've been really pleased with it so far
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for about a month, so I can't speak yet as to how it holds up, but I've been really pleased with it so far. Holds plenty on both compartments, no issue removing or placing bag, looks great, and seals off odors beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna H Walker

customer_reviews.title: love the convenience
customer_reviews.text: so easy to use - looks great - i read the reviews on the whole garbage bag issue - it fits you just have to tuck it in a little bit - warning though they are tiny - its just me so I dont have a lot of garbage but I could see if anyone had a lot of people this would be annoying - also even when the can is full - your bag is only about 1/2 full!
customer_reviews.author: Stasy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: Great Trash Can. Absolutely no problems. First trash can I have had where the top of the bag doesn't slowly inch its way towards to bottom making it hard to get it out when it is full. The lids are impossible to get open without using the foot step mechanism, which is perfect if you had small children or dogs who get into the trash. The lid sits flush with the out rim. Easy to clean. Seems a bit expensive, but I've had no problems, so I guess I can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: MMs'

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact compared to others I've looked at so ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact compared to others I've looked at so they fix in the small amount of space I have for recycling. They appear to be very good quality, were a reasonable price and work well.
customer_reviews.author: MMLELL

customer_reviews.title: ... big dog figured his way into everyone of are garbage cans, but after having this for about a ...
customer_reviews.text: We got this because are big dog figured his way into everyone of are garbage cans, but after having this for about a month this was are solution. he cannot get into it and it comes with the two cans inside. overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: User23

customer_reviews.title: These well-functioning trashcans made our kitchen look 10x better. Also
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed! These well-functioning trashcans made our kitchen look 10x better. Also, I LOVE that it is not electronic. Some things are not meant to be electronic, trashcans being one of them. I know this product will always look good and it will always work, unlike the electronic ones that I have witnessed not working after X amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flawed Pedal Design/Construction
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful that this trashcan would be what I had been looking for. Unfortunately the construction of the pedals are poorly designed, which over time, would not withstand the heavy use that a family of 4+ requires. Flimsy plastic, that slides to the side when pressed down. I ended up returning this and now continue my search.
customer_reviews.author: passion4life

customer_reviews.title: We love this can and use it for trash and recycling
customer_reviews.text: We love this can and use it for trash and recycling. Our only complaint is the baskts fit just a little too tight to the inner walls of the can, which makes it tricky to put the baskets in with a bag in them.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy H.

customer_reviews.title: It’s probably going to be dented
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed that I paid $100 for something that came with not one but TWO dents in it.... I see I’m not the only one who had this issue..
customer_reviews.author: Cassie C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. The concept of a dual trash can like this is great but for the price I paid I was expecting something more substantial. I don't mean size wise, I read the reviews saying it took smaller bags. This thing is as flimsy as a soda can. It has dents, scratches, it weighs next to nothing. So disappointing. Apparently there is no good version of a dual can like this, I have looked high and low.
customer_reviews.author: Mysticalbane

customer_reviews.title: I may get another for the game room.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this dual can system! I thought it would be too big, but it doesn't have nearly the footprint the two separate plastic tall kitchen trash cans. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Chesterfield

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great !
customer_reviews.text: We recycle a lot at our house so I really wanted a garbage can that had both a trash and recycling compartment. It works wonderfully, looks nice and feels durable . I’m very satisfied with my purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey A.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, good size for 1-2 people
customer_reviews.text: it works for it's purpose, sturdy, good size for 1-2 people, there's definitely room for improvements, but, for now im happy to be able to sort trash and recycle properly
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir S.

customer_reviews.title: It fits nicely in the area we wanted
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly what we were looking for. It fits nicely in the area we wanted, it seems well-made, keeps our toddler from throwing things away anymore. Very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Adams

customer_reviews.title: Nice appearance. Buckets pull out nicely
customer_reviews.text: It is very compact but holds alot. Nice appearance. Buckets pull out nicely. Only issue is the right hand lid stopped seating well in the closed position within 2 weeks. Now it sits ajar
customer_reviews.author: John E Slettedahl

customer_reviews.title: Was a great product for 4 years
customer_reviews.text: Was a great product for 4 years. Footpedal broke off. We ordered a 2nd one and it arrived dented. First one actually arrived dented too. After reading all the reviews and giving the manufacturer 4 years to figure out how to ship their product, decided to send back and get something else.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works great!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this trash can! And a great value for the price. We have been looking for a great double trashcan that has a nice low profile and is easy to empty - and we found it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryane

customer_reviews.title: Garbage in one side
customer_reviews.text: I'm organized! Garbage in one side, recyclables in the other. One can for both. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: mark loweree

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Having 2 containers in my kitchen was taking up too much room. This one is compact and fits perfectly. I get the trash receptacle and recyclables container in one!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best trashcan ever
customer_reviews.text: This is easily my new favorite item in my household. After struggling with old trashcans with ill-fitting lids that were taking a ton of space in my kitchen and were easily accessible to our baby, this is such a welcome change. I use thinner kind of trash bags without drawstrings and I find it easy to put them in. Bonus: baby still can't figure out how to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Abapolnikova

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, matches perfect with stainless steel appliances
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, matches perfect with stainless steel appliances. Does the job for trash/recycling. The only downfall is once trash is full it is hard to get out and gets stuck on the metal handle inside bin.
customer_reviews.author: bd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple design for the price I wish they made a larger version.
customer_reviews.author: Alouisecrab

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bin!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. The packaging was perfect. The product is awesome for less than 1/2 of what Bed Bath charges. Totally worth the cost and looks great!!!
customer_reviews.author: MSN

customer_reviews.title: Good Trash can for Recycling
customer_reviews.text: This is a good trash can for recycling. Both sides are a decent size so I don't have to change out the garage side as fast as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: J.Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works well does what it says it will. Not for a large home with lots of family members. It is great for 2 or 3 in a household.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking trash bins
customer_reviews.text: Great looking compared to our old open bins. Convenient. Can use 13 gal tall bags with it. No more puppy getting into trash!
customer_reviews.author: BigSteve

customer_reviews.title: I love this once you get use to a bit smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this once you get use to a bit smaller trash can. It looks great in my kitchen and I no longer have recyclables on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Received this unit in perfect condition and looks awesome in place
customer_reviews.text: Received this unit in perfect condition and looks awesome in place. The two containers are smaller than the two separate units I had previously however this dual unit looks so much nicer -- it's worth it! I am a pleased customer.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little small but love it and does exactly what I needed it to do
customer_reviews.author: Nakresha J.

customer_reviews.title: My family loves this garbage can. It is the perfect size for my ...
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this garbage can. It is the perfect size for my kitchen. The only thing I have a problem with is getting the plastic liner back in the can straight when I change the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was like super excited to receive this trashcan but when I took it out of the box it was already dented! For $130 I would think a product like this would not come pre-damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. It would be nice to have something on ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It would be nice to have something on the lids to lift them up by hand in addition to the food control.
customer_reviews.author: A. Yoffe

customer_reviews.title: For the price you really can't beat this. I ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price you really can't beat this. I would say the only negative is that when you try to pull your trash bag out, it gets stuck on the inner handle.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Michalewicz

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my NYC apartment kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and functions just right for my NYC apartment kitchen. Easy to keep clean. Nicely sized.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a small family. Chic looking and promotes easy recycling!
customer_reviews.author: C. Yu

customer_reviews.title: A stylish recycling option
customer_reviews.text: Works well and has a reasonable amount of capacity. Only wish it had a way to open with my hand, and not just with my foot.
customer_reviews.author: bill f

customer_reviews.title: it looks nice and works fine
customer_reviews.text: it looks nice and works fine. I did come from a simpleHuman model which was destroyed in a move which had a more responsive pedal and would go close/drop the lid slowly so it didn't slap like this one does. But hey, this ones cheaper and works fine, you get what you pay for :)
customer_reviews.author: blind_skwirl

product_meta.description: 900602 features: -inner compartments are removable and hold 8 gallons each. -Each bin fits 10-13 gallon trash bags. -Heavy-duty steel frame. -Hand-free step pedals. -Convenient carry handle. Overall Depth - Front to back: -13". Overall Product Weight: -25 lbs.
feature_bullets: Dual trash can allows you to separate waste for easy sorting
Stainless steel with heavy-duty step pedals
Removable inner buckets for easy cleaning
Convenient carry handle, includes sticker pad so you can label each bin
Removable inner bins Made from recycled plastic
